description:
Delaware startup secures a $25 million Series B funding round from PeakSpan Capital and Oxx. SOCRadar has raised to $30.2 million to date.

The post SOCRadar Raises $25M Series B for Threat Intel Tech appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: SOCRadar Raises $25M Series B for Threat Intel Tech

description:
ARPA-H has announced a $50 million investment in tools to help IT teams better secure hospital environments.

The post US to Invest $50 Million in Securing Hospitals Against Cyber Threats appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: US to Invest $50 Million in Securing Hospitals Against Cyber Threats

description:
Rockwell Automation is concerned about internet-exposed ICS due to heightened geopolitical tensions and adversarial cyber activity globally.

The post Rockwell Automation Urges Customers to Disconnect ICS From Internet appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Rockwell Automation Urges Customers to Disconnect ICS From Internet

description:
Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager update resolves multiple vulnerabilities, including a critical authentication bypass.

The post Critical Veeam Vulnerability Leads to Authentication Bypass appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Critical Veeam Vulnerability Leads to Authentication Bypass

description:
Critical vulnerability in GitHub Enterprise Server allows unauthenticated attackers to obtain administrative privileges.

The post Critical Authentication Bypass Resolved in GitHub Enterprise Server appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Critical Authentication Bypass Resolved in GitHub Enterprise Server

description:
Ivanti has released product updates to resolve multiple vulnerabilities, including critical code execution flaws in Endpoint Manager.

The post Ivanti Patches Critical Code Execution Vulnerabilities in Endpoint Manager appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Ivanti Patches Critical Code Execution Vulnerabilities in Endpoint Manager

description:
SecurityWeek’s Threat Detection and Incident Response (TDIR) Summit takes place on Wednesday, May 22nd as a fully immersive virtual summit.

The post Virtual Event Today: Threat Detection and Incident Response (TDIR) Summit appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Virtual Event Today: Threat Detection and Incident Response (TDIR) Summit

description:
Claroty shows how Honeywell ControlEdge Virtual UOC vulnerability can be exploited for unauthenticated remote code execution.

The post Critical Vulnerability in Honeywell Virtual Controller Allows Remote Code Execution appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Critical Vulnerability in Honeywell Virtual Controller Allows Remote Code Execution

description:
Google released a Chrome 125 update to resolve four high-severity vulnerabilities reported by external researchers.

The post Chrome 125 Update Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Chrome 125 Update Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities

description:
As chatbots become more adventurous, the dangers will increase.

The post Beware – Your Customer Chatbot is Almost Certainly Insecure: Report appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Beware – Your Customer Chatbot is Almost Certainly Insecure: Report
